title: Multiclassing
content: y adding together values determined by the specific spellcasting Classes or Subclasses they have levels in. The values for the Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer and Wizard will be same as their Class level. The values for the Paladin and Ranger will be half of their Class level, rounded down. Finally, the value for spellcaster Subclasses will be one-third of their Class level, rounded down.
